message.name: LM_TASK_MARKASACTIVE
message.description: LiteStep sends this message when an application has called ITaskbarList::ActivateTab or ITaskbarList::SetActiveAlt.

parameter.name: wParam
parameter.description: A handle to the window that should be marked as active.

remarks.p: To receive this message, modules need to register for it by using LM_REGISTERMESSAGE.
